content.rendered:
Get acquainted with 5 amazing Salesforce MVPs who will share their secrets to success

Join us for a super spectacular event featuring 5 amazing Salesforce MVPs who will share their personal experiences, wisdom and secrets to success.

About this event

Join us for a super spectacular event featuring 5 amazing Salesforce MVPs who will share their personal experiences, wisdom and secrets to success.

Long before I was a Salesforce MVP I learned from MVPs through their blogs and sessions, I was inspired by their generosity and I was cheered on through one on one encounters at “MEET THE MVPs” parties at Dreamforce. It was life changing for me and I wanted to recreate the magic and provide a way for Trailblazers to get acquainted with MVPS in fun and engaging way.

MVP HOSTS

Notisblank Monica | Misty Jones(Liberty Mutual) | Eric Dreshfield (Active Campaign)

MVP PANELISTS

Amber Boaz | Meighan Brodkey | Jean-Michel Mougeolle | Mark Adcock| Danielle Laffey

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/meet-the-salesforce-mvps-april-7-9am-pacific-time-tickets-149149583419

Panelists (the MVPs)

Amber Boaz

Mark Adcock

Danielle Laffey

Jean-Michel Mougeolle

Meighan Brodkey

excerpt.rendered: Get acquainted with 5 amazing Salesforce MVPs who will share their secrets to success

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce Highlights from MVPs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce MVPs, AI enthusiasts, futurists, and sceptics uncover what’s next for Salesforce across Sales, Service, Marketing, and IT. Featuring Leyna Hoffer, Shivanath Devinarayanan, Meighan Brodkey, Mohith Shrivastava, Rakesh Gupta, Jean Michel Mougeolle, Amit Chaudhary, Jan Vandevelde, Atul Gupta, Fabrice Cathala, Eric Dreshfield.

jetpack-related-posts.title: How Flow Can Help You Become a Developer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Using Flow to Become a Developer North Africa DreaminOctober 19, 2019 <!-- --> North Africa Dreamin Why Participate? During this event, developers, administrators, business users and Salesforce partners will gather to train and share their knowledge and expertise. It will also be an opportunity for members to get to know…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Panaya: Best Practices for Maintaining Healthy Salesforce Architecture
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: May 5 webinar with Guillermo Pedroni and myself tried and true best practices for maintaining healthy Salesforce Architecture. With tips on planning security, keeping your design simple – from the start, data cleanup & mapping and more.

jetpack-related-posts.title: DSFUG Plugins Extension & Add-ons
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Presentation on tools extensions and apps for the Dallas Salesforce Developer User Group

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dallas Developer Group Road to CTA: July 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: July 22 as we gathered (virtually) to discuss News in the Salesforce world with our peers.Thrilled to join Dallas Developer User Group to share will share with us the How and Why I has undertaken the journey to CTA as well as advising others who are interested in pursuing. Learn…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce 2017
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Dreamforce 2017 presentation, What happens when an Admin, an “Admineloper” and a Salesforce Developer discuss what really matters to them? 3 devoted Salesforce pros share experiences & offer tips to devs that would take months (or years) to learn. Learn common misunderstandings btw Admins & Developers, gotchas & more
